summary: Iteration 12 - P2 Sidebar Search & Favorites, P3 Buying DNA Sales Hunter, P3 Real-time Chat Testing: All features working correctly. Backend APIs (9/9 tests passed) and Frontend UI fully functional.
context_for_next_testing_agent: P2 Sidebar Search & Favorites, P3 Buying DNA Sales Hunter, and P3 Real-time Chat modules fully functional. Sidebar search filters navigation items in real-time. Favorites use localStorage and show starred items at top. Buying DNA shows 4 summary cards (Urgent, Gentle, Pre-emptive, On Track) with 0 patterns initially (requires accounts with 2+ orders). Chat page has WebSocket support with REST fallback.

sidebar_search.details: Search bar filters navigation items in real-time. Typing 'Buying' shows Buying DNA link.

sidebar_favorites.details: Star/unstar buttons work. Favorites stored in localStorage. Favorites section appears at top of sidebar when items are starred.

buying_dna_page_load.details: Page loads with title 'Buying DNA Sales Hunter' and DNA icon

buying_dna_summary_cards.details: All 4 summary cards displayed: Urgent Follow-up (red), Gentle Reminder (amber), Pre-emptive Check (blue), On Track (green)

buying_dna_api_patterns.details: Returns patterns array and summary object with total_tracked, urgent_followup, gentle_reminder, preemptive_check, no_action counts

buying_dna_api_dashboard.details: Returns summary, top_urgent, recent_followups, and metrics

realtime_chat_api_rooms.details: Returns list of chat rooms for current user

realtime_chat_api_create_room.details: Creates new chat room (direct, group, or channel)

realtime_chat_api_messages.details: REST fallback for sending/receiving messages works correctly

realtime_chat_api_online_users.details: Returns list of currently online users

realtime_chat_websocket.details: WebSocket endpoint exists but not tested via Playwright (REST fallback verified)

sidebar_buying_dna_link.details: Navigation sidebar has 'Buying DNA' link with DNA icon at data-testid='nav-buying-dna'

dashboard_quick_actions.details: Quick Actions widget shows 6 quick links: Add Lead, Create Quotation, New Invoice, Run Report, Custom Fields, AI Dashboard

chat_page_ui.details: Chat page loads with Messages panel, Chats/Tasks tabs, search, and 'Select a conversation or start a new chat' prompt
